name: Sandbox Software Solutions
overview:
Sandbox Software Solutions, based in Southwestern Ontario, Canada, is a developer of custom websites, custom software, IT support and technical consulting services.

Sandbox has developed a Java-based web content management system, Intratuitive, which has been used extensively in the creation of websites, intranets and client portals. Intratuitive has grown to include more the 25 modules providing function for secure portals, custom home page development, landing page creation, polls and surveys, and social networking.

Sandbox has also recently developed an easy-to-use template design-based website builder, WebplicityBuilder, which creates simple websites at low cost of investment to those who build.

In development are client/marketing program relationship management software and website framework builders that incorporate a web-based CRM.
